title: Boil Water Advisory - Cedar Rapids
description: A boil water advisory has been issued for parts of Cedar Rapids due to a water main break. Residents should boil water for at least one minute before drinking, cooking, or brushing teeth.

title: Swim Advisory - Lake Macbride
description: High bacteria levels detected at Lake Macbride State Park. Swimming is not recommended until further notice.

title: PFAS Exceedance - Waterloo
description: PFAS levels above the new EPA health advisory limit detected in Waterloo water supply. Residents are advised to consider alternative water sources.
